name: PIEstimator – Personal Injury Calculator WordPress Plugin by Case Assist
author: Case Assist

sections.description:
Case Assist Personal Injury Calculator is more than just a “calculation tool.” It can assist in estimating potential personal injury compensation, before legal proceedings even begin.

Personal injury claims can be complex, even if you’re consulting legal professionals or using standard calculation methods. There are many factors outside of your control, that could influence the compensation you may receive, without any warning.

Case Assist Personal Injury Calculator, is a tool that allows users to enter estimated values, for the following details:

  • Medical Fees:
  • Future Medical Fees:
  • Property / Vehicle Damage:
  • Income Loss:
  • Future Income Loss:

It allows users to mention if they’ve required any health services, or needed any medical assistance:

  • Services Rendered: Occupational Therapy, Chiropractor Therapy, Breaks/Fractures, Surgery.

Lastly, it helps you assess the following aspects of a personal injury claim:

Estimated Settlement: $

Note / Disclaimer

To assess your potential reimbursement, you’ll need more than just a “calculation tool.” Calculation tools are a starting point but lack the nuance needed for personal injury settlements.

To dig deeper. What you will require, is experienced legal council / a comprehensive solution that accounts for; unique case details, negotiation, legal complexities, emotional factors etc. This can help determine how strong of a case can be made. Along with insights to navigate the process with care and understanding.

Taking the time to consult with an attorney, ensures a more accurate and fair assessment. For personalized guidance and legal support, reach out to our team today.

Video: Shortcode Demo
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ca-personal-injury-calculator directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Create a new or use an existing page / post. Then type the following shortcode in the provided text area of the page / post. Shortcode: [ca_personal_injury_calculator]
  4. Save draft or publish the page / post.
  5. Click preview or view the published page to see the plugin.

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.3 or higher. PHP 8.0 or higher is recommended.

Manually

  1. Upload the entire ca-personal-injury-calculator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Create a new or use an existing page / post. Then type the following shortcode in the provided text area of the page / post. Shortcode: [ca_personal_injury_calculator]
  4. Save draft or publish the page / post.
  5. Click preview or view the published page to see the plugin.
sections.faq:
What Is a Personal Injury Calculator?

A personal injury calculator. Is a tool that helps estimate potential compensation, for personal injury claims based on various factors, such as; medical expenses, property damage, and income loss.

Can the Calculator Predict the Outcome of My Legal Case?

No, the calculator provides an estimate and should not be considered a prediction of the actual legal outcome.

Is My Information Secure When Using an Online Calculator?

In the context of our “Case Assist Personal Injury Calculator” plugin. The information is handled on the client side and is not transmitted or stored on the server. Making it secure within the scope of the plugin.

Where can I find support for PIEstimator?

Have a problem? First, take a look at our Getting Started guide. If that doesn’t answer your question, you can receive support for PIEstimator at the support forum, the Case Assist Team, or our official questions portal.

short_description: This calculator approximates personal injury compensation, offering a broad understanding. It doesn't replace professional legal consultation.
